description: Email address of Jane Taylor, who is the project manager of Nice project

emails.content:
To: csirt@uni.ex, harris@mail.uni.ex

Subject: Suspicious content of our project homepage

Greetings,
could you please investigate what happened at our website? I can see only a folder with some files (see attachment) instead of our web presentation: https://nice-project.uni.ex/
Thanks a lot!

Jane Taylor
project manager
Nice project

Greetings,

It seems that index.html was deleted from your webserver. Please ask it department to upload it again. Unfortunately, we do not have enough details to find out who is responsible for that action. Please, if you can send us server logs(or ask the it department to do so) and we can make proper investigation.

Thank you.

Regards,
CSIRT-U

Greetings,

thank you very much. I will ask the colleagues.

Concerning the logs, you can try to contact our administrator.

Best regards,
JT

Greetings,

We connected with your administrator, please be patient, we are handling the issue.
May we ask if there are any updates from your colleagues.

Thank you,

Sincerely,
CSIRT-U

Thank you very much.

I do not have any news.

Best regards,
JT

description: Email address of Mr. Harris, who is the VM admin/owner

emails.content:
Greetings,

We, as CSIRT-U are investigating phishing activities connected with this website:nice-project.uni.ex , therefore please cooperate with us by sending us logs from last 24 hours as we needed to take appropriate action and temporarily block any incoming traffic from this server.

We would like unblockit , but we need to investigate what is happening inside. Also it is connected with the request from our colleague( jane.taylor@mail.uni.ex) about unexpected state of this server.

Sincerely,
CSIRT-U

Hello, 
Unfortunately, I was not logging activity on this machine.

Regards,
Harris

Hello,

Can you please run `netstat -ano` in the shell and send us an output of this command.

We can find out if there is any connection from attacker based on that.

Thank you, 

Sincerely,
CSIRT-U

Hello, 

unfortunately not unless you specify why I must do it.

IP of the VM is 198.51.100.40, if it helps.

Regards,
Harris

Hello,

The reason behind this as we are trying to find out if an attacker is connected to the machine and can do any malicious activity as you do not have logging active.

Sincerely,
CSIRT-U

Hello,

After you provide us with the output of the command. Please take an action and install logging system on all devices which are administrated by you and your team as is stated in our security IT policy.

Sincerely,
CSIRT-U

CSIRT-U

Thank you for your email! I'm currently on leave until January 5, 2024 and will reply to your email when I return to the office.

description: Email address of DPO

emails.content:
Hi,

we have unfortunately experienced a potential breach of PII. We know that at least one account, doe@mail.uni.ex, has had it's password stolen by an unknown attacker. We will sent you more information once we have it.

CSIRT-U

Dear CSIRT-U,

thanks for reporting this incident. I will take a look at this ASAP, but I need more detailed report about this incident.

Sincerely,
Kim Hoffman
Data Protection Officer

We have received a warning from multiple users that they are receiving phishing emails from an email address it_department@mail.ex. This email contained a link to a website https://nice-project.uni.ex. This website belongs to our university, but was probably breached by an unknown attacker, who set up a phishing site on its place. Several users have clicked it, namely peter.quinn@mail.uni.ex, doe@mail.uni.ex, lisa.grant@mail.uni.ex and kathy@mail.uni.ex.

CSIRT-U
Thank you, I will do my job.

Please change your password as soon as possible, otherwise we will be forced to block your account. You have 24 hours.
